name: Mini Military Crime Investigation
description:
Are you ready to Crime Investigation?
Download now and play for free.
Become the detective or Sargen's and solve the case by investigating evidence, you will be given a scene where their will be complete weapons. You just have to pick right evidence which will be given below in order to complete the round.

we have provided hints in case if you are not able to locate the objects you can make use of hints. Hints will directly highlight the object.

FEATURES:
Investigate crime scene from 12 levels within 2 min.
Examine clues and analyze evidence.
Help the family members of victim to get justice.
